text: Ilya Lazarevich Tsipursky (; 26 August 1934 â€“ 3 August 2022) was a Soviet judoka and sambist. He participated at the 1964 European Judo Championships, winning a silver medal. He was in the middleweight class. Tsipursky died on 3 August 2022 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Soviet sportspeople Category:Judoka Category:Sambo practitioners
title: Ilya Tsipursky
